department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: This is a tender for printing the 19 Wing Comox Totem Times newspaper.
description: The services of a printing press to print the bi-weekly Canadian Forces Newspaper known as the 19 Wing Comox Totem Times to the Department of National Defence, 19 Wing Comox, Wing Supply, Lazo, BC V0R 2K0 Canada.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Notice

* **Title (English)**: W0133-23T032 - Services of a printing press
* **Title (French)**: W0133-23T032 - Les services d’une presse à imprimer
* **Contract Reference Number (Contract Reference Numéro)**: WS3891808875-Document 3999904156

#### Contract Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3891808875
* **Publication Date**: July 10, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 9, 2023 at 14:00 (MST)
* **Contract Duration**: Not specified (Expected Contract Start Date: None; Expected Contract End Date: None)

#### Tender Status

* **Status**: Expired (already closed to bids)

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive – Open bidding (Concurrentielle – Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest combined rating of technical merit and price (Cote combinée la plus élevée pour le mérite technique et le prix)

#### Contract Details

* **Category of Procurement**: Service (SRV)
* **Procurement Region**: British Columbia (Colombie-Britannique)
* **Delivery Region**: British Columbia (Colombie-Britannique)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Christine Cress (Cress, Christine, SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issued a Request for Proposal for the services of a printing press to print the bi-weekly _Canadian Forces Newspaper_ (19 Wing Comox Totem Times) for the Department of National Defence (DND) at 19 Wing Comox, Wing Supply, Lazo, BC. 

Please note the tender has already closed on August 9, 2023. The bid submission package and all responses are only accessible through the [Discovery Ariba portal](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16208562?extsite=MTYyMDg1NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
